title: How to Insert Page Numbers in Microsoft Word 2007

steps.title: You'll see this tab at the top of your Word document.
steps.content: You'll see this tab at the top of your Word document. It'll be between the "Home" and "Page Layout" tabs.

steps.title: You'll see this option in the "Header & Footer" section.
steps.content: You'll see this option in the "Header & Footer" section. A list of page number options will expand.

steps.title: Select either Top of Page or Bottom of Page.
steps.content: Select either Top of Page or Bottom of Page . This is your choice- you can also select other options, but these two are most common.

steps.title: Click the desired page numbering option.
steps.content: Click the desired page numbering option. Your page numbers will instantly appear in your document. If you need to choose some custom number formatting, such as not adding a "1" to the cover page of your document, return to Insert > Page Number and click Format Page Numbers .
